description: Triangular array T read by rows: T(n,0) = 1 for n >= 0; T(n,k) = C(n,k) for k = 1,2,...,n, for n = 1,2,3; and for n >= 4, T(n,k) = T(n-1,k-1) + T(n-1,k) for k = 1,2,...,[ (n+2)/2 ] and T(n,(n+3)/2) = T(n-1,(n+1)/2) if n is odd.
references: E. Lucas, Théorie des Nombres, Albert Blanchard, Paris, 1958,tome1, p.88
formula: T(n, k) = C(n, k) - C(n, k-4). - _Ralf Stephan_, Jan 09 2005T(2n,n) = A026029(n). - _Philippe Deléham_, Mar 12 2013T(2n-1,n) = A026016(n), n>0. - _Philippe Deléham_, Mar 12 2013
prog: (PARI) {T(n, k) = if( 2*k < n+4, binomial( n, k) - binomial( n, k-4), 0)} /* _Michael Somos_, Jan 08 2012 */
author: _Clark Kimberling_
